channel.title: Getting Server & Client online
channel.description:
Are there any tuts on how to host a source and client online..
Kinda like Moparscape, runescape.. I want to have a source and web client, all functional online.. I have a server and webspace.. I know some stuff, I just need a tut to get me in the right direction, I have tried a few things, I just am not sure how to put this client online..
I would like to have just a url that I will set up load a client when navigating to the address and launch a source from server?
I have searched the forum, I see tuts on how to host from my pc with no-ip, but nothing on how to host from an internet server..
I am still searching..
-JT

item.title: Getting Server & Client online
item.dc:creator: @Trisant Trisant
item.description:
@Trisant wrote:

yes, I have been searching

can I make the existing client that I have a “web Client” or should I be searching for a web client…

I believe the one I have to be a Deltascape Client…

I found this link…

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

I just ran thru this tut, I have a headache now and making a pot of coffee…

I hope this works…

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Server & Client online
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

you mean a webclient?

Read full topic

item.title: Getting Server & Client online
item.dc:creator: @Trisant Trisant
item.description:
@Trisant wrote:

As I had indicated, I have found many tuts on how to host a source from my PC with no-ip…

I am looking for info on how to host a source and client from an online web server…

I want to inbed the client into the webpage like runescape.com and have it use the source from the webserver.

I am still searching…

Read full topic
